name: Slices in jelly
title: Felix Sensations · Slices in jelly · salmon - trout
description: Felix Slices in jelly salmon - trout

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: with trout in a jelly with spinach:Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (12%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives (trout 4%), minerals, vegetables (0.3% spinach dehydrated, equivalent to 4% spinach in the jelly), Various sugars.*chunks: 40% Meat and animal derivatives.with salmon in a jelly flavoured with shrimp:Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (12%), Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives (salmon 4%), Molluscs and crustaceans (shrimp 1%), minerals, Various sugars.*chunks: 40% Meat and animal derivatives.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 655; Vit D3: 100; Vit E: 15; mg/kg: 3b103: (Fe: 7.6); 3b202: (I: 0.19); 3b405: (Cu: 0.66); 3b503: (Mn: 1.5); 3b605: (Zn: 13); 3a370: 413.Flavourings.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 655; Vit D3: 100; Vit E: 15; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 7.6); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 0.19); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.66); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 1.5); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 13); taurine: 413.Flavourings.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide :For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 3 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.Feeding guide :For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 4 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.Feeding guide :For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 4 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.For an average adult sterilised cat (4kg), feed 3 pouches per day in at least 2 separate meals.
